
snap(0,0,0)

sky(10000,10000,10000)
fog(10000,10000,10000)
ground(10000,10000,10000)

fadefrom(13865)

name(The Last Stage)

nlaps(-1)

set(31,0,0,250,0)

set(34,0,0,250000,-90)p
chk(58,0,0,250000,0)
set(34,0,0,250000,180)p
chk(58,0,0,250000,90)
set(34,0,0,250000,90)p
chk(58,0,0,250000,0)
set(34,0,0,250000,0)p
chk(58,0,0,250000,90)

fix(61,0,0,999290,0)
fix(61,0,0,999290,0)
fix(61,0,0,999290,90)
fix(61,0,0,999290,90)

.maxb(7,-10000,-15000)
.maxt(7,10000,-15000)
.maxr(7,10000,-15000)
.maxl(7,-10000,-15000)

set(55,0,0,250000,-45)
set(55,0,0,250000,45)
set(55,0,0,250000,-45)
set(55,0,0,250000,45)

set(58,0,0,250000,0)po
set(34,0,0,250000,0)po
set(58,0,0,250000,90)po
set(34,0,0,250000,90)po
set(58,0,0,250000,0)po
set(34,0,0,250000,180)po
set(58,0,0,250000,90)po
set(34,0,0,250000,-90)po
